data.name: Anarchy: Supporter Pack DLC
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1133060/Anarchy_Wolfs_law
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a set of extra goodies for people who want to support developers and participate in the development of the Anarchy: Wolf's law project.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* +1 Sponsor-Key from the full version of the game Anarchy: Wolf's law
* x4 start box slots (cache)
* + Premium set of clothes and weapons (we will gradually add exclusive, cool goodies)
Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1133060/Anarchy_Wolfs_law
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a set of extra goodies for people who want to support developers and participate in the development of the Anarchy: Wolf's law project.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* +1 Sponsor-Key from the full version of the game Anarchy: Wolf's law

Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592680/Anarchy_Wolfs_law__Prologue/ on Steam in order to play
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
